overview: Levi King is the President & COO of Lendio (formerly FundingUniverse). Levi is responsible for the day-to-day management of Lendio, including sales, customer service, risk analysis, production, and operations. Levi has extensive experience working with small businesses to diagnose risk and in designing paths that lead towards establishing a secure business model. His primary expertise lies in serving as the daily driver of the business with oversight of people, data, processes, and systems. His expertise in mitigating risk of failure extends past underwriting conducted pre-funding, as he is also an expert in determining whether the financial and marketing plan that will be followed by the business upon acquisition of financing will truly deliver satisfactory results measured by new profits for the business.
